verses.roman:
īśvara-caritra prabhura--buddhira agocara
yabe yei karena, sei saba--manohara

synonyms: īśvara-caritra—character exactly like that of the Supreme Personality of Godhead; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; buddhira agocara—beyond one's intelligence; yabe—when; yei—whatever; karena—He did; sei—that; saba—all; manohara—very beautiful.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu behaved exactly like the Supreme Personality of Godhead, beyond the restriction of anyone's intelligence. Whatever He liked He did, but all His activities were very beautiful.
